text: NGC 7837 is a spiral galaxy located about 470 million light-years away in the constellation of Pisces. The galaxy was discovered by astronomer Albert Marth on November 29, 1864. NGC 7837 appears to interact with NGC 7838 forming Arp 246. == See also == * List of NGC objects (7001–7840) == References == == External links == * 7837 246 516 Category:Pisces (constellation) Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1864 Category:Spiral galaxies Category:Discoveries by Albert Marth
title: NGC 7837
